Welcome to the Unidata Python Example Gallery! Check out detailed examples for atmospheric science and meteorology, from data analysis to publication-quality figures. Feel free to use code from these examples in your own work.

Have an example you would like to share with the community? Check out the Contributor's Guide and then submit a Pull Request to the repository on GitHub!
